posts.title: Post 1
posts.body: A JavaScript application running in the browser can usually only access HTTP resources on the same domain (origin) that serves it.

posts.title: Post 2
posts.body: One very important thing that needs CORS is ES Modules, recently introduced in modern browsers.

posts.title: Post 3
posts.body: If you donâ€™t set up a CORS policy on the server that allows to serve 3rd party origins, the request will fail.

comments.body: nice post but having some doubt
